Package ddt

This package contains libraries that implement custom routines for access and navigation through ddt_ tables.

See:
          Description

Script Summary
emos_ddt_access_lib This library defines a sequential forward "iterator" (as much as one can emulate a real iterator in a language such as TSL) for data tables (ddt-interface).
emos_ddt_access_range_lib This library defines an "iterator" (as much as one can emulate a real iterator in a language such as TSL) for data tables (ddt-interface).
emos_ddt_lib  
 

Package ddt Description

This package contains libraries that implement custom routines for access and navigation through ddt_ tables. The following naming convention for libraries has been applied: <vendor>_<package>_<name>_lib

  • vendor: indicator of code origins, e.g. emos
  • package: ddt (stands for "data-driven test")
  • name: short name inidicating the nature of the library (also used as a prefix for functions contained in that particular library)
  • lib: constant indicating the compiled module
